General.Name: Extreme Sportsbook
General.Description: Extreme Sportsbook is a decentralized gambling platform that allows users to bet directly from their wallet on sports games. Extreme Sportsbook leverages its own PoS blockchain with a 2nd layer network of masternodes to provide these services. XSB is the currency used in the Extreme Sportsbook platform.

ICO.Description:
Extreme Sportsbook is a decentralized gambling platform that allows users to bet directly from their wallet on sports games. Extreme Sportsbook leverages its own PoS blockchain with a 2nd layer network of masternodes to provide these services. XSB is the currency used in the Extreme Sportsbook platform.

The Extreme Sportsbook ICO started on the 1st of November and will last until the 30th of November, 2017. The ICO token allocation is 90% of the total supply and will be available for a $0.25 starting pice. Users will be able to gamble using both BTC and ETH. The funding cap is set at 100 BTC.

Token Reserve Split (10%):

  • 7% Team
  • 3% Bounties

The Extreme Sportsbook will feature a bounty campaign.
